title: Supermarket Store Manager Job at Lorache Consulting Limited
content:
Lorache Consulting Limited operates as a Business Process and Strategy, Human capital Development and Marketing Management Consultancy firm. The firm is piloted by a team of experienced professionals and exceptional management strategist who are distinguished and seasoned in their various fields of specialization.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Supermarket Store Manager

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Store manager or assistant in Supermarket Retail industry, is responsible for leading a team of Sales Associates to assist customers in their shopping needs.
	Their duties include hiring and training qualified store employees, taking inventory of products or placing orders as needed and helping Sales Associates handle customer questions or complaints.


Responsibilties


	Manage store operational requirements by scheduling and assigning employees
	Recruit, select, orient and train employees
	Maintain results by coaching, counseling and disciplining employees
	Prepare annual budget, schedule expenditure, analyze variances and initiate corrective actions
	Identify current and future customer requirements by establishing rapport with potential and existing customers
	Ensure availability of merchandise and marketing products in store
	Secure merchandise by implementing security systems and measures
	Protect employees and customers by providing a safe and clean store environment
	Maintain the stability and reputation of the store by complying with legal requirements
	Provide training to improve the knowledge base of the staff and use cross-training methods to maintain productivity when employees are absent
	Manage all controllable costs to keep operations profitable
	Manage stock levels and make key decisions about inventory control
	Analyze sales figures, forecast future sales and interpret trends to facilitate planning
	Ensure standards for quality, customer service, and health and safety are met
	Respond to customer complaints and comments
	Organize special promotions, displays and events
	Update colleagues on business performance, new initiatives, and other pertinent issues
	Maintain awareness of market trends in the retail industry, understanding forthcoming customer initiatives and monitoring what local competitors are doing
	Initiate changes to improve the business, e.g. revising opening hours to ensure the store can compete effectively in the local market.


Requirements


	Have a Bachelor's Degree in any subject
	Have at least five years of experience in Store manager or retail and one year experience in leadership
	Are able to motivate a team, delegate work fairly, and contribute as a team player
	Have a relentless commitment to delivering customer service excellence and building strong customer relationships
	Can show knowledge of budgeting, marketing, strategic planning, and vendor relationship management
	Have sound knowledge of technology products and the current retail environment
	Consistently deliver results and have first-class sales skills
	Are highly organized and able to communicate well both verbally and in writing.


Salary
N400,000 monthly (net).

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their applications to: lorachevacancy@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

content:
Lorache Consulting Limited operates as a Business Process and Strategy, Human capital Development and Marketing Management Consultancy firm. The firm is piloted by a team of experienced professionals and exceptional management strategist who are distinguished and seasoned in their various fields of specialization.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior HR Officer

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Senior HR Officer will lead talent management, performance evaluation, and work culture initiatives while overseeing payroll, employee benefits, and statutory compliance.


Key Responsibilities
Talent & Performance Management:


	Develop talent retention strategies and performance evaluation systems.
	Track employee efficiency and drive engagement programs.


Payroll & Benefits Administration:


	Process payroll, ensuring compliance with tax, pension, and labor laws.
	Manage employee benefits (HMO, allowances, etc.) and policy reviews.


Statutory Compliance:


	Ensure adherence to labor regulations (NSITF, PenCom, ITF).

	Skills: Strong analytical, communication, and HR software proficiency.


Salary
N330,000 / month (Gross).

title: Warehouse Manager Job at Lorache Consulting Limited
content:
Lorache Consulting Limited operates as a Business Process and Strategy, Human capital Development and Marketing Management Consultancy firm. The firm is piloted by a team of experienced professionals and exceptional management strategist who are distinguished and seasoned in their various fields of specialization.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Warehouse Manager
Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking for an experienced and detail-oriented Warehouse Manager to oversee daily warehouse operations and ensure optimal productivity and safety.
	The ideal candidate will lead a team of warehouse staff, manage inventory, coordinate logistics, and maintain compliance with company standards and regulations.


Responsibilities


	Oversee the day-to-day operations of the warehouse
	Manage receiving, storage, inventory, order fulfillment, and shipping processes
	Lead, train, and schedule warehouse staff to meet productivity goals
	Coordinate with suppliers, logistics teams, and delivery providers
	Implement continuous improvement processes to enhance warehouse efficiency
	Ensure accurate inventory management through regular audits and recordkeeping
	Monitor safety standards and enforce proper warehouse safety procedures
	Maintain warehouse cleanliness and equipment maintenance schedules
	Track key performance metrics and prepare regular operations reports
	Handle issues related to damaged or missing inventory and resolve shipment discrepancies


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Supply Chain Management, Logistics, Business, or related field (preferred)
	5 years of experience in warehouse and logistics management
	Strong leadership and team management skills
	Excellent organizational and multitasking abilities
	Familiarity with warehouse management systems (WMS) and logistics software
	Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail
	Knowledge of health and safety regulations in warehouse environments
	Effective communication and decision-making abilities
	Ability to lift and move heavy items when necessary
	Experience using inventory software or ERP systems
	OSHA certification or other warehouse safety training is a plus.


Method of Application

title: Sales Personnel Job at Zhongxin Network Technology Company Limited
content:
Zhongxin Network Technology Company Limited is a start-up company that is into sales of computer, phone and accessories.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Personnel
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking to hire a high-performing Enterprise Sales Executive to drive business growth and client acquisition in the enterprise connectivity space.
	This role requires a strategic and consultative approach to sales, from identifying leads to closing deals, while working closely with internal teams to deliver a top-notch service.


Responsibilities


	Identify and secure new enterprise clients.
	Design and implement effective sales plans: consistently meet or exceed monthly and quarterly sales targets.
	Client Engagement: Conduct consultations to assess enterprise connectivity needs.
	Present customized solutions to key decision-makers: Build and nurture strong, long-term client relationships.
	Manage the full sales lifecycle (proposals, quotations, negotiation, closure).
	Maintain accurate sales metrics and forecasts: Address client inquiries, issues, and post-sale support needs.
	Stay informed on connectivity trends, technologies, and competitors.
	Provide expert advice on appropriate networking solutions: Collaborate with technical teams for seamless solution delivery.
	Partner with marketing, technical, and support teams.
	Maintain detailed sales and client interaction records in CRM.


Requirements


	B.Sc or M.Sc. in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field.
	Proven success in meeting/exceeding sales targets.
	Strong consultative selling, negotiation, and presentation skills.
	Proficient with Microsoft Office Suite and CRM tools.
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
	Relevant professional certifications (sales, networking) are a plus.


Key Competencies:


	Business acumen & commercial awareness
	Problem-solving & critical thinking
	Customer focus & relationship management
	Resilience & performance-driven mindset
	Team collaboration & adaptability


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hrzhongxinnetwork@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
